profile: I am a tech-driven Computer Engineering student passionate about software development. With hands-on experience in web development and real-time systems, I enjoy building innovative projects that solve real-world problems. My involvement in Google Developer Groups has expanded my technical expertise, particularly in front-end development. I am eager to collaborate, learn, and contribute to projects that push the boundaries of technology.

experience.organization: Google Developer Group, Sta. Mesa, Manila
highlights: Developed and analyzed web development curricula, mentoring cadets for technical excellence.
Taught a study jam session on HTML and CSS, helping members build foundational knowledge.
Participated in Sparkfest Hackathon website development.

experience.organization: AWS Cloud Club, Sta. Mesa, Manila
experience.role: Department of Cloud Computing and Infrastructure Member
highlights: Completed training on AWS Cloud Services, focusing on infrastructure and deployment models.
Explored compute, storage, and database services, including EC2, S3, and RDS.

education.school: Polytechnic University of the Philippines, Sta. Mesa, Manila

projects.name: Face Recognition with Attendance and Email System
details: Tkinter-based GUI for attendance system with real-time facial detection.

projects.name: Student Curricular Activity Manager App
details: GUI with flashcards, progress tracker, and collaborative notebook.
JWT authentication and SQLAlchemy database management.

projects.name: Data Structure & Algorithm Visualization
details: Interactive DSA Visualizer for CMPE 201 class.
Dynamic animations to improve algorithm comprehension.

projects.name: Sparkfest 2025 Hackathon Website
details: Contributed to GDG PUP Hackathon website.
Developed responsive, accessible, and scalable UI.

certifications.title: DataCamp Scholar
certifications.note: Awarded for excellence in data engineering through Data Engineering Philippines.
